cs213.photoAlbum.gui.view

Class photo

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • cs213.photoAlbum.gui.view.photo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class photo
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    the window that displays the photo details has add/delete tag and move photo functionality can cycle through the photos in an album with next/previous buttons
    Author:
    Jasmine Feng and Risham Chokshi
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
